note.p: Birth: Grosvenor Square, London, England (24 June 1831)
Death: His house in Portman Square, London (28 June 1890)
Burial: In the chapel in the grounds of his Berkshire estate, Highclere
Education: Eton; Christ Church, Oxford. BA (1852), DCL (1859), LLD (1864, Cambridge)
Career: Constable of Caernarvon Castle (1854); Under Secretary of State for the Colonies (1858-1859); Privy Councillor (1866); Lord Lieutenant of Ireland (1885-1886)
